alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 4:57AM CST until December 05 at 11:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up around one tenth of an inch. These higher ice accumulations will fall in a very narrow band along and just north of the Highway 18 corridor. * WHERE...Northeast Iowa and Southwest Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CST this morning. * WHEN..Beginning between 5 and 6 AM, persisting until late morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest impacts will likely fall in a narrow west to east corridor not more than 20 to 30 miles wide while locations outside of this corridor may see little to no impacts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell; Winneshiek
